description:
Class D prepares to face their next major challenge, a test called "Paper Shuffle" where the price of failure is expulsion.
Source: Crunchyroll

titles.title: Douter de tout ou tout croire, ce sont deux solutions également commodes, qui l`une et l`autre nous dispensent de réfléchir.
Subete o Utagau Koto mo Subete o Shinjiru Koto mo Tomo ni An`i de, Shikou o Houki Suru ni Hitoshii.
To Doubt Everything or to Believe Everything Are Two Equally Convenient Solutions; Both Dispense with the Necessity of Reflection.
すべてを疑うこともすべてを信じることも共に安易で, 思考を放棄するに等しい.
